Class Crypt

java.lang.Object
  Crypt

public class Crypt
extends java.lang.Object

This Crypt class constructs javax.crypto.Cipher objects with password-based data encryption, PBEWithSHA1AndDESEDE. The salt is currently constant in this class, but it could be modified to take a salt as part of a constructor. This class performs no exception handling, all potential exceptions are thrown.

This code is released for educational purposes only and does not come with any warranty for the merchantability or fitness for any particular purpose.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Geoffery Miller

Constructor Detail

Crypt

public Crypt(java.lang.String password)
      throws java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException,
             java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
             javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
             java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
             java.security.InvalidKeyException,
             java.security.spec.InvalidParameterSpecException,
             java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
Crypt objects require a password secret. To create a Crypt object, you will need to provide the password that it will use to encrypt and decrypt data with. The salt used by Crypt is constant.

Parameters:
password - The password to construct the encryption and decryption ciphers
Throws:
java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - This will only occur if UTF-8 is not supported on your system
java.security.InvalidKeyException
java.security.spec.InvalidParameterSpecException
java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
Method Detail

encrypt

public byte[] encrypt(byte[] data)
               throws javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                      javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
This method will take an array of unencrypted bytes and encrypt them using the password provided to create this Crypt object. The returned byte array will be encrypted.

Parameters:
data - The data to encrypt using this Crypt object
Returns:
The encrypted data
Throws:
javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
javax.crypto.BadPaddingException

decrypt

public byte[] decrypt(byte[] data)
               throws javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                      javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
This method takes a byte array of encrypted bytes and returns a byte array of decrypted bytes, using the password provided to create this Crypt object.

Parameters:
data - The data to decrypt using this Cypher object
Returns:
The decrypted data
Throws:
javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
